examples.example: 即使是阴天，也不能影响我们积极向上的心情和乐观的生活态度。

translate.english: Even if it is a cloudy day, it cannot affect our positive mood and optimistic attitude towards life.

examples.example: 阴天的时候我喜欢坐在窗边，静静欣赏那独特的宁静之美。

translate.english: On cloudy days, I like to sit by the window and quietly appreciate the unique beauty of tranquility.

examples.example: 阴天的日子里，我依然会微笑着面对生活中的一切。

translate.english: On cloudy days, I will still smile and face everything in life.
